price: Alipo waambia ndugu yao, Luut'i: Je! Hamumchimngu?.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Mtume! Watajie watu wako pale Lut'i alipo waambia watu wake, naye ni ndugu yao na shemeji yao:

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum lūṭun alā tattaqūna
